TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed Dns extends System.Object
public ref class Dns abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供簡單的網域名稱解析功能。

span.span: Provides simple domain name resolution functionality.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是靜態類別，從網際網路網域名稱系統 (DNS) 會擷取特定主機的相關資訊。The class is a static class that retrieves information about a specific host from the Internet Domain Name System (DNS). 主機的 DNS 查詢將傳回的資訊執行個體中類別。The host information from the DNS query is returned in an instance of the class. 如果指定的主機在 DNS 資料庫中，具有一個以上的項目包含多個 IP 位址和別名。If the specified host has more than one entry in the DNS database, contains multiple IP addresses and aliases. ## Examples 下列範例會查詢 DNS 資料庫中的主機 www.contoso.com 的詳細資訊。The following example queries the DNS database for information on the host www.contoso.com. [!code-cpp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Dns Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic Dns Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static IAsyncResult BeginGetHostAddresses (string hostNameOrAddress, AsyncCallback requestCallback, object state);
.method public static hidebysig class System.IAsyncResult BeginGetHostAddresses(string hostNameOrAddress, class System.AsyncCallback requestCallback, object state) cil managed
Public Shared Function BeginGetHostAddresses (hostNameOrAddress As String, requestCallback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: static IAsyncResult ^ BeginGetHostAddresses(System::String ^ hostNameOrAddress, AsyncCallback ^ requestCallback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主機名稱或 IP 位址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

param.name: requestCallback
param.span: 委派，會於作業完成時參考要叫用的方法。

span.span: An delegate that references the method to invoke when the operation is complete.

param.name: state
param.span: 使用者定義物件，包含作業的相關資訊。

span.span: A user-defined object that contains information about the operation.

param.span: 作業完成時，這個物件會傳遞給 requestCallback 委派。

span.span: This object is passed to the requestCallback delegate when the operation is complete.

summary.span: 非同步傳回指定之主機的網際網路通訊協定 (IP) 位址。

span.span: Asynchronously returns the Internet Protocol (IP) addresses for the specified host.

returns.span: 參考非同步要求的 執行個體。

span.span: An instance that references the asynchronous request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會以非同步方式查詢與主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址的 DNS 伺服器。The method asynchronously queries a DNS server for the IP addresses that are associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 位址，此位址就會傳回沒有查詢 DNS 伺服器。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 如果空字串當做傳遞`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`requestCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 如需有關使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For more information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`requestCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會以非同步方式查詢 DNS 伺服器 IP 位址和 IP 位址相關聯的別名。The method asynchronously queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. **請注意**應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。**Note** This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`requestCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[非同步呼叫同步方法](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md) ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來解決 IP 位址到執行個體。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器的主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址或 IP 位址。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. **請注意**應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。**Note** This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). 非同步作業必須完成呼叫方法。The asynchronous operation must be completed by calling the method. 一般而言，方法由叫用`requestCallback`委派。Typically, the method is invoked by the `requestCallback` delegate. 這個方法不會封鎖直到作業完成為止。This method does not block until the operation is complete. 若要封鎖，直到作業完成為止，使用方法。To block until the operation is complete, use the method. 如需使用非同步程式設計模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[呼叫同步方法以非同步方式](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md)。For detailed information about using the asynchronous programming model, see [Calling Synchronous Methods Asynchronously](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/calling-synchronous-methods-asynchronously.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來解決 IP 位址到執行個體。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器的主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 位址，此位址就會傳回沒有查詢 DNS 伺服器。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. 如果空字串當做傳遞`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會封鎖直到作業完成。This method blocks until the operation is complete. 若要以同步方式執行這項作業，使用方法。To perform this operation synchronously, use the method. 如果屬性設定為`true`、屬性不會擴展這個方法所傳回的執行個體，而且將永遠為空白。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器的主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses associated with a host name. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`是 IP 位址，此位址就會傳回沒有查詢 DNS 伺服器。If `hostNameOrAddress` is an IP address, this address is returned without querying the DNS server. 如果空字串當做傳遞`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. IPv6 位址會從結果篩選方法如果本機電腦沒有安裝 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 如此一來，便可取得回空只有 IPv6 產生可用的執行個體`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用將 IP 位址解析為類型的陣列方法。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an array of type . [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢主機資訊的網際網路 DNS 伺服器。The method queries the Internet DNS server for host information. 如果您傳遞空字串做為主機名稱，這個方法會擷取本機電腦的標準主機名稱。If you pass an empty string as the host name, this method retrieves the standard host name for the local computer. 非同步 DNS 資訊的存取，使用和方法。For asynchronous access to DNS information, use the and methods. 如果屬性設定為`true`、屬性不會擴展這個方法所傳回的執行個體，而且將永遠為空白。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來取得指定的 DNS 主機名稱的 DNS 資訊。The following example uses the method to get the DNS information for the specified DNS host name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器 IP 位址和 IP 位址相關聯的別名。The method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. IPv6 位址會從結果篩選方法如果本機電腦沒有安裝 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 如此一來，便可取得回空只有 IPv6 產生可用的執行個體`address`參數。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `address` parameter. 屬性不會擴展這個方法所傳回的執行個體，而且將永遠為空白。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用方法來解決 IP 位址到執行個體。The following code example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#4)]

Public Shared Function GetHostEntry (hostNameOrAddress As String) As IPHostEntry

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主機名稱或 IP 位址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

summary.span: 將主機名稱或 IP 位址解析至 執行個體。

span.span: Resolves a host name or IP address to an instance.

returns.span: 執行個體，含有在 中所指定之主機的相關位址資訊。

span.span: An instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器的主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址或 IP 位址。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果空字串當做傳遞`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到主機名稱， 11001 （Windows 通訊端錯誤 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND） 的值會傳回例外狀況。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 伺服器沒有回應時，會傳回這個例外狀況。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名稱不是正式的主機名稱或別名，或者它找不到所查詢的資料庫中，也會傳回這個例外狀況。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 例外狀況也會傳回如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 方法會假設如果 IP 常值字串傳入`hostNameOrAddress`參數應用程式想傳回屬性集的所有執行個體。The method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 這些屬性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . 如此一來，實作方法傳遞 IP 字串常值時，表現下列行為：As a result, the implementation of the method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 方法會嘗試剖析位址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數包含合法的 IP 字串常值，則第一個階段會成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字串常值的 IP 位址的反向對應會嘗試取得的主機名稱。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此結果會設定為屬性。This result is set as the property. 3. 若要取得所有可能的 IP 位址名稱相關聯，並將設定為會再次使用此反向對應的主機名稱屬性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. IPv4 字串常值，可能會成功上述所有三個步驟。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但是它也可以過時的 DNS 記錄確實是屬於不同的主機傳回 IPv4 位址。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 這可能會導致步驟 #3 失敗並擲回例外狀況 （沒有 DNS PTR 記錄的 IPv4 位址，但沒有 DNS A 記錄的 IPv4 位址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). Ipv6，上面的步驟 2 可能會失敗，因為大部分的 IPv6 部署不會註冊 IPv6 位址的反向 (PTR) 記錄。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此這個方法可能會傳回字串 IPv6 常值中的完整格式網域 (FQDN) 主機名稱作為屬性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法有相對於 IP 常值不同的行為。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果成功上面的步驟 1 （成功解析為 IP 位址），結果會立即傳回位址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不會在反向對應。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. IPv6 位址會從結果篩選方法如果本機電腦沒有安裝 IPv6。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of the method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 如此一來，便可取得回空只有 IPv6 產生可用的執行個體`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 屬性不會擴展這個方法所傳回的執行個體，而且將永遠為空白。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來解決 IP 位址到執行個體。The following example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CPP/dnsnewmethods.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/CS/dnsnewmethods.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.Dns#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.Dns/vb/dnsnewmethods.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync (System.Net.IPAddress address);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync(class System.Net.IPAddress address) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHostEntryAsync (address As IPAddress) As Task(Of IPHostEntry)
public: static System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::Net::IPHostEntry ^> ^ GetHostEntryAsync(System::Net::IPAddress ^ address);

param.name: address
param.span: IP 位址。

span.span: An IP address.

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式，將 IP 位址解析至 執行個體。

span.span: Resolves an IP address to an instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 傳回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性會傳回包含 中所指定主機之位址資訊的 執行個體。

span.span: The property on the task object returns an instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後，才會完成`address`是否已解決。The returned object will complete after the `address` has been resolved. 這個方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器 IP 位址和 IP 位址相關聯的別名。This method queries a DNS server for the IP addresses and aliases associated with an IP address. 如果本機電腦沒有安裝 IPv6，IPv6 位址會篩選從這個方法的結果。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of this method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 如此一來，便可取得回空只有 IPv6 產生可用的執行個體`address`參數。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `address` parameter. 屬性不會擴展這個方法所傳回的執行個體，而且將永遠為空白。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Threading.Tasks.Task<System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync (string hostNameOrAddress);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class System.Net.IPHostEntry> GetHostEntryAsync(string hostNameOrAddress) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetHostEntryAsync (hostNameOrAddress As String) As Task(Of IPHostEntry)
public: static System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::Net::IPHostEntry ^> ^ GetHostEntryAsync(System::String ^ hostNameOrAddress);

param.name: hostNameOrAddress
param.span: 要解析的主機名稱或 IP 位址。

span.span: The host name or IP address to resolve.

summary.span: 以非同步作業的方式，將主機名稱或 IP 位址解析至 執行個體。

span.span: Resolves a host name or IP address to an instance as an asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 傳回 。

span.span: Returns .

returns.span: 工作物件，表示非同步作業。

span.span: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

returns.span: 工作物件上的 屬性會傳回包含 中所指定主機之位址資訊的 執行個體。

span.span: The property on the task object returns an instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項作業不會封鎖。This operation will not block. 傳回物件之後，才會完成`hostNameOrAddress`是否已解決。The returned object will complete after the `hostNameOrAddress` has been resolved. 這個方法會查詢 DNS 伺服器的主機名稱相關聯的 IP 位址或 IP 位址。This method queries a DNS server for the IP address that is associated with a host name or IP address. 如果空字串當做傳遞`hostNameOrAddress`引數，則這個方法會傳回本機主機的 IPv4 和 IPv6 位址。If an empty string is passed as the `hostNameOrAddress` argument, then this method returns the IPv4 and IPv6 addresses of the local host. 如果找不到主機名稱， 11001 （Windows 通訊端錯誤 WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND） 的值會傳回例外狀況。If the host name could not be found, the exception is returned with a value of 11001 (Windows Sockets error WSAHOST_NOT_FOUND). 如果 DNS 伺服器沒有回應時，會傳回這個例外狀況。This exception can be returned if the DNS server does not respond. 如果名稱不是正式的主機名稱或別名，或者它找不到所查詢的資料庫中，也會傳回這個例外狀況。This exception can also be returned if the name is not an official host name or alias, or it cannot be found in the database(s) being queried. 例外狀況也會傳回如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數包含或。The exception is also returned if the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains or . 這個方法會假設，如果傳入 IP 常值字串`hostNameOrAddress`參數應用程式想傳回屬性集的所有執行個體。This method assumes that if an IP literal string is passed in the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter that the application wants an instance returned with all of the properties set. 這些屬性包括， ，和。These properties include the , , and . IP 字串常值傳遞時，如此一來，這個方法的實作表現下列行為：As a result, the implementation of this method exhibits the following behavior when an IP string literal is passed: 1. 方法會嘗試剖析位址。The method tries to parse the address. 如果`hostNameOrAddress`參數包含合法的 IP 字串常值，則第一個階段會成功。If the `hostNameOrAddress` parameter contains a legal IP string literal, then the first phase succeeds. 2. 使用 IP 字串常值的 IP 位址的反向對應會嘗試取得的主機名稱。A reverse lookup using the IP address of the IP string literal is attempted to obtain the host name. 此結果會設定為屬性。This result is set as the property. 3. 若要取得所有可能的 IP 位址名稱相關聯，並將設定為會再次使用此反向對應的主機名稱屬性。The host name from this reverse lookup is used again to obtain all the possible IP addresses associated with the name and set as the property. IPv4 字串常值，可能會成功上述所有三個步驟。For an IPv4 string literal, all three steps above may succeed. 但是它也可以過時的 DNS 記錄確實是屬於不同的主機傳回 IPv4 位址。But it is possible for a stale DNS record for an IPv4 address that actually belongs to a different host to be returned. 這可能會導致步驟 #3 失敗並擲回例外狀況 （沒有 DNS PTR 記錄的 IPv4 位址，但沒有 DNS A 記錄的 IPv4 位址）。This may cause step #3 to fail and throw an exception (there is a DNS PTR record for the IPv4 address, but no DNS A record for the IPv4 address). Ipv6，上面的步驟 2 可能會失敗，因為大部分的 IPv6 部署不會註冊 IPv6 位址的反向 (PTR) 記錄。For IPv6, step #2 above may fail, since most IPv6 deployments do not register the reverse (PTR) record for an IPv6 address. 因此這個方法可能會傳回字串 IPv6 常值中的完整格式網域 (FQDN) 主機名稱作為屬性。So this method may return the string IPv6 literal as the fully-qualified domain (FQDN) host name in the property. 方法有相對於 IP 常值不同的行為。The method has different behavior with respect to IP literals. 如果成功上面的步驟 1 （成功解析為 IP 位址），結果會立即傳回位址。If step #1 above succeeds (it successfully parses as an IP address), that address is immediately returned as the result. 不會在反向對應。There is no attempt at a reverse lookup. 如果本機電腦沒有安裝 IPv6，IPv6 位址會篩選從這個方法的結果。IPv6 addresses are filtered from the results of this method if the local computer does not have IPv6 installed. 如此一來，便可取得回空只有 IPv6 產生可用的執行個體`hostNameOrAddress`.parameter。As a result, it is possible to get back an empty instance if only IPv6 results where available for the `hostNameOrAddress`.parameter. 屬性不會擴展這個方法所傳回的執行個體，而且將永遠為空白。The property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

span.span: Gets the host name of the local computer.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Net.IPHostEntry Resolve (string hostName);
.method public static hidebysig class System.Net.IPHostEntry Resolve(string hostName) cil managed
Public Shared Function Resolve (hostName As String) As IPHostEntry
public: static System::Net::IPHostEntry ^ Resolve(System::String ^ hostName);

param.name: hostName
param.span: DNS 式網域名稱或 IP 位址。

span.span: A DNS-style host name or IP address.

summary.span: 解析 DNS 主機名稱或 IP 位址至 執行個體。

span.span: Resolves a DNS host name or IP address to an instance.

returns.span: 執行個體，含有在 中所指定之主機的相關位址資訊。

span.span: An instance that contains address information about the host specified in .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會查詢相關聯的主機名稱或 IP 位址的 IP 位址的 DNS 伺服器。The method queries a DNS server for the IP address associated with a host name or IP address. 當`hostName`dns 主機名稱相關聯的多個 IP 位址，只有第一個 IP 位址解析成該主機名稱就會傳回。When `hostName` is a DNS-style host name associated with multiple IP addresses, only the first IP address that resolves to that host name is returned. 如果屬性設定為`true`、屬性不會擴展這個方法所傳回的執行個體，而且將永遠為空白。If the property is set to `true`, the property of the instance returned is not populated by this method and will always be empty. > [!NOTE] > 您的應用程式中啟用網路追蹤時，這個成員會發出追蹤資訊。This member emits trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[網路追蹤.NET Framework 中](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md). ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來解決 IP 位址到執行個體。The following example uses the method to resolve an IP address to an instance. [!code-cpp[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/CPP/dns_resolve.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/CS/dns_resolve.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Dns_Resolve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Dns_Resolve/VB/dns_resolve.vb#1)]
